CS:GO is free now, so mind as well try it out. Used to play R6 Siege more than CS, but now I've had more fun playing CS instead. Not a huge learning curve (no need to watch tutorials/guides, you learn easily enough by playing the game) but there is a high skill ceiling. Casual gamemodes can be loud and toxic but the competitive scene is fairly mature.

Very good game.
I had a lot of unstable relationships, CS:GO took care of all of them.
